fact: Did you know that the S&P 500, despite representing the largest U.S. companies, has a surprisingly high turnover rate, with an average company lifespan on the index of only 16 years?
didYouKnow: Did you also know U.S. Presidents typically have very little impact on the stock market?

references.title: Investopedia - The S&P 500 Index: You Need to Know
Presidents and Their Impact on the Stock Market
